Hi Oliver,

> Hi all,
>
> Does anyone know of a site where one can dump the exact software used for
> a
> published set of experiments (rather than providing a link to a site that
> may or may not still contain the software or particular version that was
> used), all the relevant configuration files and other input, and perhaps
> the output/results produced corresponding to the published results?

We put our code here and I encourage you to do the same:
http://pages.isir.upmc.fr/evorob_db/moin.wsgix

The wiki is hosted on our lab's webserver and I check that it does not
disappear :)

It was especially designed for evolutionary robotics but anything that
deals with evolving stuffs can go there.

Best regards,
-- 
Jean-Baptiste Mouret
http://people.isir.upmc.fr/mouret/
